definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
(classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: If you do not have a waffle iron, just use a fry pan and cook like a pancake.
sentences.chinese: 若沒有華夫鐵板，可用煎鍋代替，象做薄烤餅那樣。

sentences.english: So the fried chicken wings, waffles with syrup and hot sauce.
sentences.chinese: 炸雞翅，華夫餅加糖漿，還有辣醬。

sentences.english: Hi. I like that waffle teepee that you have built.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我喜歡你做的華夫餅乾小屋。
